item.title: Welcome to Programming Reality
item.description: Welcome to my website and blog. Join me as I share my exploration of reality through the lens of language, and primarily machine-readable language.

item.title: Deploying Services like Plex Behind an Nginx Reverse Proxy
item.description: In this setup, there is a computer running nginx with a public IP address. There is a DNS record for every service behind the proxy. I typically use one DNS A record for the nginx reverse proxy and create a CNAME record for each service.

item.title: Personal Infrastructure Part 1: Introduction and Basic Ansible Setup

item.title: Personal Microservices Infrastructure Project
item.description: Join me as I build a personal datacenter, a “homelab” suitable for playing with microservices infrastructure. This is the first chapter of a story where people reclaim their power from their digital lords, and grow into equal peers in the digital realm.
